name: The Arrow Game
description:
This project is a type of Hyper Casual game for now. I will improve it later.
Missings:
1)Points are not working.
2)Rotation script has error but you can still play with arrow keys.
3)Hitting collider boxes of the target board has some errors.
The game is playable however you wont see any errors while playing.
Extras that will be added:
1)I will add some Medieval theme textures and Quest board. This game will be used later as an Archery training ground. I also add an Axe Throwing ground too. 
2)Land is missing. I will add an Environment where you can see beautiful trees, rocks, mushrooms...etc.
3)I will add some animals and people around game. If you shoot them you will get penalty points. I also want to add a apple and dummy person aka Classical medieval shooting range.
4)I also gonna add a bet mode. Where you can bet your points.
